instruction: Create a new story that uses the following words: tulip, lighthouse, firefly
output:
The night was dark and still when Peter arrived at the lighthouse. Built on the edge of a cliff, it stood tall against the starry sky. He was looking for something, but was not sure what. 
Suddenly, a firefly fluttered past him, lighting up the way. He followed it, and eventually came across a beautiful garden with colorful tulips blooming. It was a magical sight, and Peter knew that he had found what he was looking for. He smiled, knowing that this was a place he wanted to stay and explore.
